Text: Bitter Moon:  The film is known in France as "Lunes de fiel " (a pun on the French phrase "lune de miel", meaning "honeymoon").
Triplets:<Bitter Moon
2:
--------------------
Text: Bitter Moon:  The script is inspired by the novel "Lunes de fiel", written by the French author Pascal Bruckner.
Triplets:<Pascal Bruckner

Text: Bitter Moon:  The score was composed by Vangelis.
